overview: Ishwar Sakshi is a Hindi drama starring Ankita Srivastava, Sandeep Bhansali, Chandan Madan and S.M. Zaheer. A father Seth Haridas (Zaheer) promises to marry off his daughter Jyoti (Srivastava) to a young man Madhav (Madan) with the statue of Lord Vishnu (Bhansali) as the witness. Later, he goes back on his word and Madhav appeals to the Lord for help.
title: Ishwar Sakshi
